rooms.description: Open-plan living area with minimalist design, featuring ample natural light from a large North-facing window. Serves as the primary space for relaxation and social gatherings.
Compact yet functional kitchen integrated within the open-plan area. Features minimalist cabinetry, neutral tones, and modern appliances to maximize space efficiency.
Primary bedroom with a minimalistic design focusing on simplicity and functionality. Includes built-in storage solutions and a North-facing window for optimum light.
Private bathroom adjoining the master bedroom, designed with minimalist fixtures and efficient layout to conserve space.

openings.description: North-facing entrance door designed for inviting energy flow according to Vastu principles. Provides a direct view of the rooftop terrace.
Ventilation openings on the roof for natural airflow and light during hot weather, aligning with Vastu guidelines for promoting air circulation.
West-facing window to maintain balance in design, although primary energy flows are directed from the North entrance. Helps reduce heat gain on the west side.
